title: Kontravoid - Kontravoid (Debut Album) 2012
description:
Kontravoid - Kontravoid (Debut Album) 2012




The name Kontravoid belongs on a limited run cassette circa 1980-something, the type of tape buried in lost upstate dustbins of pre-MIDI analog electronics, wedged between Cabaret Voltaire and Das Ding. The dark industrial and new wave influences are strong on ex-Crystal Castles drummer Cam FindlayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new projectÃ¢â‚¬â€his voice is scary, like an echoing underwater growlÃ¢â‚¬â€but the underlying pop melodies always afford a degree of breathing room. The artist Felix Kalmenson has already produced two great Kontravoid music videos: Ã¢â‚¬Å“Native State,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ the albumÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most instantly rewarding song (owing to interestingly doubled male-female vocals) and its most aggressive, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Killed in Action.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Kontravoid is on sale now from Bandcamp and iTunes, courtesy of Tarantula X.

- Duncan Cooper, The Fader
